messages.message:
Closing this out. Jaeger tracing is not working properly these days but we can definitely see the improvements:

In crafting-cyp:
Before the change, removing a user took 17-19 secs.
After the change, removing a user takes < 1 sec.
What was the improvement you made btw? That is huge

btw, this only affects Cypress tests... Previously, we would check if we should remove users from all other users' personal workspace. This is useless because we can never add users to other users' personal workspaces. This took so long because we created so many test users so we have 2800+ personal workspaces to check. In regular envs, we won't have that many users in an org, so the performance wasn't too bad to be noticable
